snippet: A useful federal program intends to help graduates who walked right into a recession and faced lower earnings and higher unemployment rates.
abstract: Editorial welcomes federal program aimed at easing student loan payments for college graduates who began their careers amid recession; points out program needs to be broadly advertised if it is to reach people who need it most.
lead_paragraph: A useful federal program intends to help graduates who walked right into a recession and faced lower earnings and higher unemployment rates.

headline.seo: Relief for Student Borrowers in Pay As You Earn
